name: Android Suffering
description:
This is a side-scrolling platformer in a side view in a factory, where we play an android who was able to reactivate when he fell off the disassembly line. Your objective will be to crawl out of this factory.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We've made the game during a workshop with our school for a GameJam of 7days.

 Game made by 3 students from E-Artsup Paris in their second year of Game Art and Creative Coding .

GameJam Theme: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?

------------------- The Android Suffering Team behind the Project --------------------

Kevin Nguyen - Lead Designer,  Background, Title screen, Assets

Matthieu Mode-Yap - CharaDesigner

Axel Pouchin - Programer, Mechanics, Level Design

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
